hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Did you know that Ruto is strong enough to defeat enemies and activate ceiling switches inside Jabu Jabu's Belly?

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #7# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Game Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Potion Bottle#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #Bombs (20 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Goron Tunic#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Entrance Front Right Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Bottom of the Well Small Key# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Top

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that deep in the #wasteland a spider and a chest# hold...^ #a Map of Dodongo's Cavern# and #a Ganon's Castle Small Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Din's Fire#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #an Ocarina#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Side Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Game Key#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #5# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #treasure chest game# grants #a Slingshot#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #3# major items.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Fire Temple#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Din's Fire#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Thieves' Hideout# is on the path to #Morpha#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Fire Temple#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: Did you know that Barinade is allergic to bananas?

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Fire Temple Compass# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
